home.parrafo-info: Mid Full Stack Developer specialized in production and development with experience working for national and international universities. Expert in production databases, web development, ERP systems and AI-powered solutions focused on optimization and technological efficiency.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
I am a Mid Full Stack Developer with extensive experience in the Production and Development area, collaborating with both national and international universities. I specialize in creating and implementing technological solutions that optimize processes, improve data management and strengthen operational efficiency.

I have experience in production databases, web development, ERP software and ticket management. My most recent project is an AI-powered chatbot, designed to improve response times and support request handling.

I am a proactive, results-oriented person with a strong commitment to innovation and continuous improvement. My goal is to help organizations transform their processes through the development of intelligent and scalable tools.

formacion.title: Training
formacion.formacion2: Mid-Level Technician in Software Development - High School Diploma

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: A robot that uses AI for task automation and reduction in response time for tickets related to common errors that usually occur in systems. - Python / Docker / SQL Server
proyectos.info-proyecto2: My personal web portfolio, where you can find some of my projects, my skills, knowledge and a bit about my background. - HTML5 / CSS / JS
proyectos.title-proyecto3: QA - Migration Appointment Portal Costa Rica
proyectos.info-proyecto3: Collaborated in finding errors and bugs in the appointment management system for the DGME appointment process in Costa Rica, which allows users to schedule, modify and cancel appointments efficiently.
